item.description:
The restaurant could only accomodate us at 11:30, so plan to arrive then. There's a reservation for 8 people (Sharon H., Shelley, Linda, Ralph, Claudia, Gilbe, Gloria, and DJ) in Gloria's name. If someone who is not on this RSVP list plans to join us, you should call the restaurant and add on to the reservation!

We're going to try a new venue for brunch this month -- the Yankee Silversmith Inn in Wallingford. The buffet brunch includes all the usual stations at a cost of $18.95. We'll meet at noon. More information and directions can be found at http://www.nearhome.c...

Please RSVP so we have reserved enough spaces.
item.name: Fourth Sunday Brunch-- time change
